TypeSignature.Value: public class Tuple<T1,T2,T3,T4,T5,T6,T7> : IComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable

.class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit Tuple`7<T1, T2, T3, T4, T5, T6, T7> extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.IStructuralComparable, class System.Collections.IStructuralEquatable, class System.IComparable
Public Class Tuple(Of T1, T2, T3, T4, T5, T6, T7) Implements IComparable, IStructuralComparable, IStructuralEquatable

generic <typename T1, typename T2, typename T3, typename T4, typename T5, typename T6, typename T7> public ref class Tuple : IComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralComparable, System::Collections::IStructuralEquatable

summary.span: 表示 7 元组，或七元组。

span.span: Represents a 7-tuple, or septuple.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元组是具有特定数量和值序列的数据结构。A tuple is a data structure that has a specific number and sequence of values. 类表示 7 元组，或七元组，这是具有七个分量的元组。The class represents a 7-tuple, or septuple, which is a tuple that has seven components. 可以实例化对象通过调用或静态方法。You can instantiate a object by calling either the or the static method. 您可以使用只读的检索的值元组的组件， ， ， ， ， ，和实例属性。You can retrieve the value of the tuple's components by using the read-only , , , , , , and instance properties. 元组通常使用四个不同的方式：Tuples are commonly used in four different ways: - 表示一组数据。To represent a single set of data. 例如，元组可以表示的数据库记录，并且其组件可以表示每个字段的记录。For example, a tuple can represent a database record, and its components can represent individual fields of the record. - 若要提供轻松访问和数据集的操作。To provide easy access to, and manipulation of, a data set. 下面的示例定义对象，其中包含纽约市每次从 1950 年到 2000 年人口普查人口数据。The following example defines a object that contains population data for New York City for each census from 1950 through 2000. 七元组传递给`ComputePopulationChange`方法，它计算每年两次，人口普查以及年的整个 60 年的时间内的变化率之间的变化率。The septuple is passed to the `ComputePopulationChange` method, which calculates the annual rate of change between censuses, as well as the annual rate of change for the entire 60 year period. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`7.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`7.class/cs/example1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`7.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`7.class/vb/example1.vb#1)] - 若要从无需使用方法返回多个值`out`参数 （在 C#) 或`ByRef`参数 （在 Visual Basic 中)。To return multiple values from a method without the use of `out` parameters (in C#) or `ByRef` parameters (in Visual Basic). 例如，前面的示例返回城市名称，其计算统计信息中对象。For example, the previous example returns its computed statistics, along with the city name, in a object. - 若要将多个值传递给通过单个参数的方法。To pass multiple values to a method through a single parameter. 例如，方法只有一个参数，可提供一个值，则该线程在启动时执行的方法。For example, the method has a single parameter that lets you supply one value to the method that the thread executes at startup. 如果提供对象作为方法自变量，则可以提供具有七个项数据的线程的启动例程。If you supply a object as the method argument, you can supply the thread’s startup routine with seven items of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用静态方法实例化 7 元组对象，而无需显式指定其组件的类型。You can use the static method to instantiate a 7-tuple object without having to explicitly specify the types of its components. 下面的示例使用方法来实例化一个 7 元组，其中第一个元素的类型，其余元素的类型。The following example uses the method to instantiate a 7-tuple whose first component is of type and whose remaining components are of type . MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance bool Equals(object obj) cil managed
Public Overrides Function Equals (obj As Object) As Boolean

param.name: obj
param.span: 与该实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: The object to compare with this instance.

summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示当前的 对象是否与指定对象相等。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the current object is equal to a specified object.

returns.span: 如果当前实例等于指定对象，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current instance is equal to the specified object; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `obj`参数被视为等于当前实例在以下情况下：The `obj` parameter is considered to be equal to the current instance under the following conditions: - 它是对象。It is a object. - 其 7 个组件是与当前实例相同的类型。Its seven components are of the same types as the current instance. - 七个部件都等于当前实例。Its seven components are equal to those of the current instance. 相等性取决于每个组件的默认对象相等比较器。Equality is determined by the default object equality comparer for each component. ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个数组包含从人口数据 Los Angeles 和纽约 1950年到 2000年的七。The following example defines an array of sextuples that contain population data for Los Angeles and New York from 1950 to 2000. 每个七元组的第一个组件标识所在的城市。The first component of each septuple identifies the city. 第一、 第三列和第四个七元组包含纽约的数据。The first, third, and fourth septuples contain data for New York. 第一个七元组是一个重复的第四个七元组。The first septuple is a duplicate of the fourth septuple. 第三个七元组标识而不是"纽约"的"New York City"市/县。The third septuple identifies the city as "New York City" instead of "New York". 如示例所示，仅第四个七元组等于第一个七元组。As the example shows, only the fourth septuple is equal to the first septuple. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`7.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`7.equals/cs/equals1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`7.Equals#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`7.equals/vb/equals1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取当前 对象的第一个分量的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the current object's first component.

value.span: 当前 对象的第一个分量的值。

span.span: The value of the current object's first component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以动态确定的类型组件在两种方式之一：You can dynamically determine the type of the component in one of two ways: - 通过调用`GetType`方法返回的值属性。By calling the `GetType` method on the value that is returned by the property. - 通过检索对象，表示对象，并从返回的数组中检索的第一个元素及其方法。By retrieving the object that represents the object, and retrieving the first element from the array that is returned by its method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义一个数组从 1950 年到 2000 年，其组分包含三个美国城市 （纽约、 芝加哥和洛杉矶） 的填充数据的对象。The following example defines an array of objects whose components contain population data for three U.S. cities (New York, Chicago, and Los Angeles) from 1950 through 2000. 然后，它显示列出的数据的表。It then displays a table that lists the data. 若要显示城市名称，它检索的值为每个属性对象。To display the city name, it retrieves the value of the property for each object. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`7.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`7.item1/cs/item1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`7.Item1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`7.item1/vb/item1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 System.Collections.IStructuralComparable.CompareTo(object other, class System.Collections.IComparer comparer) cil managed
Function CompareTo (other As Object, comparer As IComparer) As Integer Implements IStructuralComparable.CompareTo

param.name: other
param.span: 要与当前实例进行比较的对象。

span.span: An object to compare with the current instance.

param.name: comparer
param.span: 提供用于比较的自定义规则的对象。

span.span: An object that provides custom rules for comparison.

summary.span: 使用指定的比较器将当前的 对象与指定对象进行比较，并返回一个整数，该整数指示当前对象在排序顺序中的位置是在指定对象之前、之后还是与其相同。

span.span: Compares the current object to a specified object by using a specified comparer, and returns an integer that indicates whether the current object is before, after, or in the same position as the specified object in the sort order.

returns.span: 一个带符号整数，指示此实例和 在排序顺序中的相对位置，如下表所示。

span.span: A signed integer that indicates the relative position of this instance and in the sort order, as shown in the following table.

item.description: 此实例和 在排序顺序中的位置相同。
This instance and have the same position in the sort order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式接口应用。This member is an explicit interface implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法允许您定义的自定义的比较对象。This method lets you define customized comparisons of objects. 例如，可以使用此方法为顺序对象基于的特定组件的值。For example, you can use this method to order objects based on the value of a specific component. 虽然可以直接调用此方法，通常称为通过对集合进行排序方法，包括参数集合的成员进行排序。Although this method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by collection-sorting methods that include parameters to order the members of a collection. 例如，调用方法和方法对象，它通过使用实例化构造函数。For example, it is called by the method and the method of a object that is instantiated by using the constructor. > [!CAUTION] > 方法应在排序操作中使用。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 它不应比较的主要目的在于确定两个对象是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象，调用方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的数组包含三个从 1950 年年到 2000年的美国城市的人口数据的对象。The following example creates an array of objects that contains population data for three U.S. cities from 1950 to 2000. 七元组的第一个组件是城市名称。The septuple's first component is the city name. 剩余的五个组件表示 1950年到 2000年 10 年时间间隔的填充。The remaining five components represent the population at 10-year intervals from 1950 to 2000. `PopulationComparer`类提供了实现，它允许的数组七元组及其组件的任何一个进行排序。The `PopulationComparer` class provides an implementation that allows the array of septuples to be sorted by any one of its components. 两个值提供给`PopulationComparer`其构造函数中的类： 定义排序顺序，该组件的位置和一个值，该值指示是否应按升序或降序顺序排序的元组对象。Two values are provided to the `PopulationComparer` class in its constructor: The position of the component that defines the sort order, and a value that indicates whether the tuple objects should be sorted in ascending or descending order. 该示例然后显示未排序顺序中的数组中的元素，按第三个组件 （1960 年的人口） 进行排序和显示它们，按第 6 个组件 （1990 年人口） 进行排序并显示它们。The example then displays the elements in the array in unsorted order, sorts them by the third component (the population in 1960) and displays them, and then sorts them by the sixth component (the population in 1990) and displays them. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 仅当另一个则没有调用实现`null`，并可以成功地强制转换 （在 C#) 或 （在 Visual Basic) 转换为对象的组件的当前实例相同的类型。The implementation is called only if other is not `null`, and if it can be successfully cast (in C#) or converted (in Visual Basic) to a object whose components are of the same types as the current instance. 方法的第一次传入的值对象进行比较实现。The method first passes the values of the objects to be compared to the implementation. 如果此方法调用返回`true`，方法是再次调用，传递的两个值对象。If this method call returns `true`, the method is called again and passed the values of the two objects. 此过程将继续，直到该方法调用返回`false`时，它将比较对特定的`Item`值或这两个值传递给该方法。This continues until the method call returns `false` when it compares a specific pair of `Item` values, or the two values are passed to the method. ## Examples 下面的示例定义`RateComparer`类，该类执行自定义测试是否相等。The following example defines a `RateComparer` class that performs a custom test for equality. 如果传递给的值及其方法属于类型或，该方法使用小数位数仅达三个测试是否相等。If the values that are passed to its method are of type or , the method tests for equality by using only up to three fractional digits. 否则，它只需调用`x`参数的`Equals`方法。Otherwise, it simply calls the `x` parameter's `Equals` method. 该示例使用此实现，以确定是否有四个包含 1950 年到 2000年之间的人口变化率相关数据的对象是否相等。The example uses this implementation to determine whether four objects that contain data on the rate of population change between 1950 and 2000 are equal. [!code-csharp[System.Tuple\`7.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`7.equals/cs/equals2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Tuple\`7.Equals#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.tuple`7.equals/vb/equals2.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法只是包装的比较器对象调用实现。the method simply wraps a call to the comparer object's implementation. 用于计算哈希代码的算法应返回相同的哈希代码的两个被认为是相等的对象。The algorithm used to compute the hash code should return the same hash code for two objects that are considered to be equal.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。This member is an explicit interface member implementation. 它只能在 实例强制转换为 接口时使用。It can be used only when the instance is cast to an interface. 此方法提供实现类。This method provides the implementation for the class. 虽然可以直接调用该方法，最常调用的集合进行排序的默认重载方法，如和、 集合的成员进行排序。Although the method can be called directly, it is most commonly called by the default overloads of collection-sorting methods, such as and , to order the members of a collection. > [!CAUTION] > 方法应在排序操作中使用。The method is intended for use in sorting operations. 它不应比较的主要目的在于确定两个对象是否相等。It should not be used when the primary purpose of a comparison is to determine whether two objects are equal. 若要确定两个对象，调用方法。To determine whether two objects are equal, call the method. 此方法使用的默认对象比较器比较每个组件。This method uses the default object comparer to compare each component. ## Examples 下面的示例创建的数组包含美国从 1950 年年到 2000年中的三个城市的人口数据的对象。The following example creates an array of objects that contain population data for three cities in the United States from 1950 to 2000. 七个组件包含城市名称遵循从 1950 年按 10 年的时间间隔的市县的人口数为 2000年。The seven components consist of the city name followed by the city's population at 10-year intervals from 1950 to 2000. 示例显示未排序的数组中的每个元组的组件，对数组进行排序，然后调用方法来显示每个元组按排序顺序。The example displays the components of each tuple in the array in unsorted order, sorts the array, and then calls the method to display each tuple in sorted order. 该输出显示，已按名称，即第一个组件排序数组。The output shows that the array has been sorted by name, which is the first component. 请注意，该示例不直接调用方法。Note that the example does not directly call the method. 隐式调用此方法数组中的每个元素的方法。This method is called implicitly by the method for each element in the array.
